title: Excellent Unit Near Mt. Baker Railway!
posting_body: Excellent Unit Near Mt. Baker Railway!
3435 Rainier Ave S Unit 6 | Seattle, WA 98144-6935
Awesome unit 1 Mile North of Columbia city on Rainier Ave walking distance to all Colombia City has to offer!
You won't want to miss the opportunity to live in this  600 sq.
ft. remodeled space with designer touches!
You will love the granite slab counter tops, updated appliances, updated paint and beautiful wood floors!
Enjoy an alternative lifestyle with all the diversity and cultural richness that the south end of Seattle has to offer.
No smoking and no pets (no exceptions), please.
Key Words: Seattle, Rainier Ave S, Mt Baker, North Beacon Hill, Lakeshore.
Walking distance to QFC - Safeway -Asian and ethnic grocery stores
15 minute walk to Rainier Square Plaza
15 Minute walk to Safeway-TMobile-Radio Shack - Taco Bell  - Magic Dragon
Less than 1 mile to Columbia City - 3 min by car or Metro Route #7
Close to Columbia City Cinema - City Galleries - Tutta Bella - La Medussa and many more great restaurants
